I think it would be incredibly helpful if in the Comparisons frame there was an option to set an item as a zero-point value, and then all other values are compared to that zero-point for the slot.

Essentially, you could see both positive and negative DPS bars, showing the difference in DPS between the selected zero-point item, and all other items of that type. This would make it more clear exactly what kind of DPS upgrade you could see switching a piece of gear, and would be helpful in comparing Optimized gear setups with your current gear.

To note, I'm using Rawr-Mage if it makes a difference.
What you describe has some design problems, but we will be including two features that do what you're looking for in a different way, in b14.

Sounds good. I look forward to seeing them.

Thanks for the quick reply.
